Create Workout Track Wdorkout Reminders Create Workout Saved Workouts Tips
{{ exercise.name }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { title = 'GymBro'; exercises: any[] = []; selectedExercise: any; workoutExercises: any[] = []; workoutName: string = ''; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.http.get('/assets/json/exercises.json').subscribe((data: any) => { this.exercises = data.exercises; this.selectedExercise = this.exercises[0]; }); } onSelect(exercise: any): void { this.selectedExercise = exercise; } addToWorkout(): void { if (!this.workoutExercises.some(exercise => exercise.name === this.selectedExercise.name)) { this.workoutExercises.push(this.selectedExercise); } else { alert('This exercise is already in the workout.'); } } finishWorkout(): void { if (!this.workoutName) { alert('Please enter a workout name.'); return; } const workout = { name: this.workoutName, exercises: JSON.stringify(this.workoutExercises) }; this.http.post('http://localhost:5000/api/complete-workouts', workout).subscribe(() => { console.log('Workout saved:', workout); this.workoutName = ''; this.workoutExercises = []; }, (error) => { console.error('Error saving workout:', error); }); } }
